name: statusBar
description: The native status bar shown on the top of the screen. The native status bar is displayed by default. It can be hidden and shown application wide.

name: hide
description: Hides the native status bar application wide.

returns.description: Promise that is resolved when the status bar is hidden.

params.name: style
params.description: If set to "light" (shorthand), then the native status bar text color is light (white on iOS 7). Optional.

name: show
description: Shows the native status bar application wide. If no parameters are given, the status bar text color is the default color (black on iOS 7).

returns.description: Promise that is resolved when the status bar is shown.

usage:
```coffeescript
supersonic.app.statusBar.show()
# Shorthand
supersonic.app.statusBar.show("light")
# Verbose
options =
 style: "light"
supersonic.app.statusBar.show(options)
```
